title: Phishing Simulation Campaign
description: A security awareness manager must conduct a simulated phishing campaign to test employee vigilance.

tasks.description: Select a phishing template from the training platform (e.g., a fake 'password reset' email).
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager selects an appropriate and realistic template.

tasks.description: Launch the phishing campaign, sending the simulated phishing email to all employees.
Analyze the campaign results, noting the percentage of users who clicked the link, and automatically enroll those users in remedial training.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager analyzes the results and ensures that employees who failed the test receive follow-up training.
